idea-plugin.name: SvgViewer 2
idea-plugin.description: An updated version of the SVG Viewer plugin originally released by Andrew Armstrong back in 2004 (I attempted to contact him but his listed email address is no longer valid) This release works with the current versions of the Intellij platform and runs in Intellij and WebStorm. It seems to have trouble in AppCode due to a missing Batik dependency. However I was unable to find a 'depends' node in the plugin.xml file that indicated it works with all Intellij platforms except AppCode so I simply left it out, indicating it works for Intellij only.
